name: It Weighs A Tonne
description:
A short game I created to help process being in a poor mental state at the time. 

Made for a university submission to fulfil a brief to make a "Leftfield collection game" (which are games with unique ideas/mechanics). 

I could explain what the game is about, but it is best experienced going in without information.

Tutorial for controls is in-game. 

Enjoy :)
